entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -39.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 10:10 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -39.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -44.1°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
